ref: 11590 vāśrá ʻ roaring ʼ RV., vāśrāˊ -- f. ʻ lowing cow, cow ʼ RV. [Cf. vāśitāˊ -- f. ʻ cow desiring bull ʼ AV. -- √vāś]
S. vahura f. ʻ desire of cow, goat, &c. for male ʼ, vahurjaṇu ʻ to desire the male ʼ ( -- a -- ?);
L. vāhraṇ ʻ to be on heat (of cows) ʼ;
P. vāharṇā ʻ to be on heat (of animals) ʼ, bahiriā ʻ heated with sexual desire (of cat, lion, elephant) ʼ.
